title: BPM Calculator
description: A simple BPM calculator for musicians.
usage1: Press the Tap button or space key to measure BPM
usage2: Press the Reset button or R key to reset BPM
usage3: The dots on the number line represent the BPM calculated from the last two taps. Use it to notice tempo changes.
usage4: Use the + and × buttons to add or remove counters.
usage5: You can change the language and theme from the icon at the top right.
